features: DE-FRIZZ and DEFINE CURLS: This 13-fluid ounce bottle of Maui Moisture Curl Quench and Coconut Oil Shampoo helps hydrate, smooth and defrizz curls while enhancing softness and body

CURLY HAIR CARE: Ideal for tight curls, the anti-frizz shampoo is safe for use on color-treated hair to help detangle, protect and define your hair's natural curl pattern leaving behind shiny, bouncy curls
UNIQUE BLEND WITH ALOE VERA: The rich blend of this curl-defining vegan shampoo contains 100% aloe vera as the first ingredient along with coconut milk, plumeria extract and papaya extract
NOT ALL MOISTURE IS THE SAME: The gentle and nourishing formula of this sulfate-free surfactant shampoo is vegan, free from silicones, parabens and mineral oil and contains no synthetic dyes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Shampoo + Conditioner for Daily Moisture, No Sulfates, 13 Fl Oz Looking for lightweight hydration? Let us lead you to our Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water Shampoo. With exotic hibiscus water, lush passion fruit, and juicy watermelon, this blend is perfect for easily weighed down, low porosity hair as well as an instant transportation to endless summers. Maui Moisture starts with a unique blend with aloe vera juice and is infused with pure coconut water, unlike some other hair products that start with deionized water as their first ingredient listed. The results? Moisturized strands, mended split ends and a healthy glow with every use. Uncover soft, smooth and weightless strands with Maui Moisture Lightweight Hydration + Hibiscus Water collection. Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse, for Curly Hair Styling, No Drying Alcohols, Parabens or Silicone, 8.5oz Stop choosing between styled curls and healthy-looking curls! You can have them both. Maui Moisture Flexible Hold + Coconut Milk Curl Foam Mousse gives you a nice and shiny, flake-free hold without drying out your locks. With 100% aloe vera as the first ingredient, this product was made to quench your hair and give it the nourishment and softness it needs with an infusion of coconut milk and mango butter. This vegan, silicone-free blend helps keep frizz at bay and coils hydrated and crunch-free. Maui Moisture Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Shampoo + Conditioner to Hydrate and Detangle Tight Curly Hair, Softening Shampoo, Vegan, Silicone & Paraben-Free, 13 Fl Not all moisture is the same! Take away lackluster curls and leave room for luscious, hydrated hair with Maui Moisture Curl Quench Coconut Oil Curl-Defining Shampoo. The hydrating formula of this anti-frizz shampoo helps smooth and defrizz curls while enhancing softness and body. Ideal for tight curls, the paraben-free, vegan shampoo is safe for use on color-treated hair and helps to detangle, protect and define your hair's natural curl pattern leaving behind shiny, bouncy curls. The rich blend contains 100% aloe vera as the first ingredient along with coconut oil, plumeria extract and papaya extract. Plus, the divine coconut water, white orange and tonka bean scent leaves locks smelling irresistibly good. This sulfate-free surfactant haircare system is vegan, free from silicones, parabens and mineral oil and contains no synthetic dyes. For a full hair care routine, pair this hydrating anti-frizz shampoo with Curl Quench + Coconut Oil Conditioner, Curl Milk and Curl Smoothie.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely LOVE this brand. I tried out this shampoo and conditioner set and first of all it smells great. To me it smells like coconut and fresh breeze. It detangled my hair in the shower which was great and left it feeling so fresh, soft, and renewed. Also, the smell lasts a long time and isn’t too strong. The only issue with this is that my lid came in slightly broken which led to some leakage but not much at all. Overall, I would give this product a try and any other products in their line.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product smells so good, It makes micro's tighter, And it is moisturizing. This is my new favorite shampoo and conditioner great for curls 10/10 recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was afraid to buy this because on the label it says “for thick curly hair” and I have fine, wavy/almost curly hair. To my surprise, it is not too heavy for my hair. Although it is dry winter time now—not sure how it would be during the moist summer. It makes my hair soft and shiny and my waves look nice.Amazon sent my set IN AN ENVELOPE and the shampoo lid cracked. Half the shampoo ended up in the shrink wrap and envelope!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The only ones I'll buy! In stores these are 8.00 a piece! Love the smell and leaves my hair clean! Buy them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really need to untangle hair first before washing. Doesn’t untangle hair as you’d expect from the labeling.. Very small bottles but good for vacations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I tried this for the first time. Kind of pricey and was skeptical, but softens hair and smells awesome ! I will be trying the other Maui shampoos and conditioners when these run out ! Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wonder why the shampoo cap arrived broken causing the shampoo to be spilled all over inside package.Reason why I gave three stars.But, I do love Maui coconut shampoo & conditioner 😍 smells amazing and it hydrates my hair
Llegó a tiempo y bien empacado, es un frasco de buen tamaño y el producto se ve bastante bien
Horrible shampoos…total waste of money… a big b NO NO……
Made my curls super soft. Overall a good shampoo

Es un buen shampoo, me lo ha dejado limpio y ayuda a que mis rizos se acomoden de forma natural, utilizo también la crema para peinar de la misma marca.El olor es agradable, nada intenso y me siento segura al utilizarlo por el tipo de ingredientes que tiene.
Not impressed... Read all the comments before buying... Not satisfied
